channel.title: CVE Feed for Juniper Networks -- Junos OS on SRX Series Services Gateways chassis cluster
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Juniper Networks -- Junos OS on SRX Series Services Gateways chassis cluster

item.title: CVE-2017-2300|2024-08-05T13:48:05.266Z -- juniper%20networks -- junos%20os%20on%20srx%20series%20services%20gateways%20chassis%20cluster
item.description: On Juniper Networks SRX Series Services Gateways chassis clusters running Junos OS 12.1X46 prior to 12.1X46-D65, 12.3X48 prior to 12.3X48-D40, 12.3X48 prior to 12.3X48-D60, flowd daemon on the primary node of an SRX Series chassis cluster may crash and restart when attempting to synchronize a multicast session created via crafted multicast packets.
